thread.title: ArtLifting showcases works by homeless, disabled Bay Area artists
thread.title_full: ArtLifting showcases works by homeless, disabled Bay Area artists - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Carolyn Said
title: ArtLifting showcases works by homeless, disabled Bay Area artists
text:
Photo: Connor Radnovich, The Chronicle Two paintings by Tim Strouss hanging at his home in San Jose, California, on Monday, Oct. 12, 2015. Two paintings by Tim Strouss hanging at his home in San Jose,...
Tim Strouss created art for much of his life but felt vulnerable about showing it. After complications from surgery left him partially paralyzed seven years ago, painting became a cathartic outlet. Two paintings by Tim Strouss hanging at his home in San Jose, California, on Monday, Oct. 12, 2015. Two paintings by Tim Strouss hanging at his home in San Jose,...
Tim Strouss created art for much of his life but felt vulnerable about showing it. After complications from surgery left him partially paralyzed seven years ago, painting became a cathartic outlet.
